description: Khirbet Abu esh-Sheba' (Bersabe in Galilee) was a fortified site used during the Jewish revolt against the Romans. It is located on the boundary between the lower and upper Galilee.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Khirbet Anu esh Shiba ISR
